#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<vector>
typedef unsigned long long ull;
using namespace std;
#define x getchar_unlocked()
#define y putchar_unlocked

void read(ull & n){
	n = 0;
	char ch = x; int sign = 1;
	while(ch < '0' || ch > '9'){ if (ch == '-')sign = -1; ch = x;}
	while(ch >='0' && ch <= '9'){
		n = n*10 + ch - '0';
		ch = x;
	}
	n *= sign;
}

void out(int i){
	if(i == 0)
	{
		y('N');y('O');y('\n');
	}
	else{
		y('Y');y('E');y('S');y('\n');
	}
}
	// Inner helper function to give gcd
ull gcd(ull a,ull b){
	if(a%b==0)
		return b;
	else
		return gcd(b,a%b);
}

bool pow_2(ull a){
	return  a&(a-1);
}

int main(){ 
	ull t,p,q,g,a;
	read(t);
	//cout<<t<<endl;
	while(t--){
		read(p),read(q);
		g = gcd(p,q);
		//cout<<g<<endl;
		p /= g;
		q /= g;
		//printf("%llu/%llu and gcd is %d\n",p,q,g);
		a = q;
		
		while(a % 2 == 0) a /= 2;
		if(pow_2(a+1) == 1){
			out(0);
			continue;
		}
		else{
			if(pow_2(p) == 0  && (p <= q+1)){
				out(1);continue;
			}
			else
				out(0);
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
